document.full_text: greece is likely to get a vital slice of aid in july to avoid default, international lenders said on friday, while the european union raised the prospect of expanding the bailout of the euro zone state.
document.title: greece likely to get aid tranche
lines_and_colors: greece is likely to get a vital slice of aid in july to avoid default, international lenders said on friday, while the european union raised the prospect of expanding the bailout of the euro zone state.
